import React from 'react' import '../../style/default.scss' import UploadButton from './Uploadbutton' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../../style/member/member_card.scss' import { MdCameraAlt } from 'react-icons/md' import { devUrl } from '../../config' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import RatingReadOnly from '../../components/Member/rating_readonly' import MemberPhoto from '../../components/Member/MemberPhoto' import Rating from '@material-ui/lab/Rating' import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box' const labels = { 0.5: '0.5', 1: '1.0', 1.5: '1.5', 2: '2.0', 2.5: '2.5', 3: '3.0', 3.5: '3.5', 4: '4.0', 4.5: '4.5', 5: '5.0', } function MemberCard() { useEffect(() => { Axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/member/get/${props.match.params.id}`).then( (res) => { setMember(res.data) } ) }) return ( <>

{val.member_Average_rating}

{/* 5.0 我是評分系統 */}
) })} ) } export default MemberCard
